Reviews.Title: Ravi's Review
Reviews.Author: Ravi
Reviews.Content: The color images were great while the black & white images were excellent.  The images were clear not grainy even in the IR night mode. For the price this camera was a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Zero star
Reviews.Author: Devan
Reviews.Content: This camera was inexpensive. The quality of the image that it produces is not great. I guess that you get what you pay for. Color is "off" and I get color "blooms" at the edges of objects. Don't waste your money on this one.. If they had a zero star that'd be my actual rating of this item.

ProductInfo.Features:
Enhanced Features and Fine Image Processor
OSD/2D-DNR/BLC/Privacy Masking; Zoom & focus outside adjusting
Auto Gain Control; Suitable for wall & celling installing
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security GW613WD Professional 1/3 inch Sony Effio CCD Waterproof Outdoor or Indoor Security Camera - 700 TV lines, 3.6mm lens, 48 IR LEDs
